mapper.sql: usersId, sortName, userPass, usersRePass, usersPassQuestion, usersPassReply, usersTrueName, usersAddrss, usersPhone, usersEmail
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_user
order by ${orderByClause}
select usersId, sortName, userPass, usersRePass, usersPassQuestion, usersPassReply, usersTrueName, usersAddrss, usersPhone, usersEmail from t_user where 1=1 AND sortName = #{sortname}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (usersId, sortName, userPass, usersRePass, usersPassQuestion, usersPassReply, usersTrueName, usersAddrss, usersPhone, usersEmail) values (#{usersid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usersrepass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userspassquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userspassreply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userstruename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usersaddrss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usersphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usersemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

sortName,

usersTrueName,

usersPhone,
usersEmail,
